title: Album Page, "Detail, Bridge of Straw, Venice", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on textured off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner: (inscribed in circle) 95; clockwise from bottom left (written on ruled line):  Scale = 1/4 execution or 0.25 = 1.00-; arch between cols. / 1/4 execution; bridge mould - / 1/4 execution; Caps - / 1/4 execution; plan of balustrade- / scale = 1/8 execution; arch mould-/ 1/4 execution; Detail Bridge of Straw / Venice.
description: Vertical sheet with sketches of the details of the bridge.  At center is a plan view of the bridge's decorative moldings and balustrade.  Above are sketeches of three  bridge columns with modified leaf and scroll capitals.  At lower left is an elevation of the pointed arch between the bridge columns, with a scale of the drawings below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Detail, Bridge of Straw, Venice", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on textured off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-164.
